descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jordan Poole dishes it off to Draymond Green who slams it home with two hands.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Poole finds a rolling Draymond for the slam) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Poole finds a rolling Draymond for the slam

videos.description: Draymond Green throws the lob to Andrew Wiggins, who flushes it home with two hands.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Draymond goes up top to Wiggins for the slam) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Draymond goes up top to Wiggins for the slam

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander beats the halftime buzzer with a stepback 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA bottoms 3 to end the half) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA bottoms 3 to end the half

videos.description: Warriors rookie Moses Moody cans the triple for the first one of his career.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Moody knocks down his first career 3) 2021/10/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Moody knocks down his first career 3

videos.description: Josh Giddey goes right at the defense and finishes the layup plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giddey attacks the basket for impressive and-1) 2021/10/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giddey attacks the basket for impressive and-1

videos.description: Chris Chiozza thinks he has the open layup, but Lu Dort comes from behind and swats it off the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dort swats the shot off the backboard) 2021/10/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dort swats the shot off the backboard

videos.description: Steph Curry gets hot from three as he knocks down five of them in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Steph bottoms 5 triples in the third) 2021/10/30 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Steph bottoms 5 triples in the third
